Posts.Content: Jul 14, 2008 12:10PM - edited Jul 14, 2008 12:12PM by Shirley39 Hi all,   I can't use deodorant at all. I have tons of them and all of them makes me swell under my arms. I had Mastectomy on the left side but even the right underarm swells and is very painful. SOOO I got a spray bottle at Wal-Mart and filled it  with warm water and add 1/4 cup of baking Soda.
